title: Promptpods Universe
description: A containerized environment for organizing thoughts, prompts, and contexts. PromptPods helps you create isolated containers for different thinking contexts, making it easier to manage complex projects and ideas.

fullDescription.content: Promptpods Universe is a containerized environment for organizing thoughts, prompts, and contexts. It helps users create isolated containers for different thinking contexts, making it easier to manage complex projects and ideas.
At the core of Promptpods Universe is the concept of "pods" - isolated containers that encapsulate specific contexts, workflows, or projects. Each pod can contain:

items.title: Identities
items.content: Different personas or thinking modes that can be activated within a pod

items.title: Rituals
items.content: Structured workflows or processes that guide thinking and creation

items.title: Files
items.content: Documents, notes, and resources specific to the pod's context

fullDescription.content: This containerization approach allows users to switch between different contexts cleanly, without the mental overhead of context-switching or the confusion of mixing unrelated ideas.
The Ritual Manager is a key feature of Promptpods Universe that allows users to create, edit, and activate structured workflows. Rituals consist of:

items: A name and description that defines the ritual's purpose
A series of steps that guide the user through the process
Activation controls that determine when and how the ritual is triggered

fullDescription.content: Rituals can be as simple as a daily reflection practice or as complex as a multi-stage creative process. The system is designed to be flexible while providing enough structure to make complex thinking processes more manageable.
Promptpods Universe is built using Next.js and TypeScript, with a focus on creating a responsive, intuitive interface for knowledge management. The application features:

items: A dark-themed interface optimized for extended use
Real-time updates and synchronization across devices
Integration capabilities with AI tools and services
Extensible architecture that allows for custom plugins and extensions
